Contact


omniORB is currently maintained by Duncan Grisby through Apasphere Ltd. Feel free to email with questions and suggestions about omniORB development and support.

If you have a problem using omniORB, your best bet is probably to post to the omniORB mailing list.

If you are interested in commercial support, please contact info@omniorb-support.com.
